akas: Doctor Who: The Last Stand (working title)
akas from release info: Doctor Who: The Last Stand (working title)

0.title: The Wrong Man
0.plot: On the 7th December 2013 The Doctor returned to Earth after his Abydos adventure to discover that his two companions, Lee and Nicky Boyce had been killed in a bombing at U.N.I.T H.Q. The Doctor then vanished without any means of communication. It is now 4 months after his disappearance and he has been found. U.N.I.T have contained him for questioning.

1.title: Finding John Smith
1.plot: A previous incarnation of The Doctor is contacted by an emergency broadcast hologram from his future self calling for help but when he goes to find him not everything is so it seems. His future self is human. The Doctor and Claudia go on a search for the fob watch containing his identity. Whatever his future self needs help with, he needs to be timelord. Finding the watch proves to be more difficult that thought and things soon take a turn for the worse.

2.title: A Deal with the Menace
2.plot: The Doctor returns after hiding undercover as human. A lot has happened since he has been away and now he is plunged into the middle of disaster. With the help of his previous incarnation and an old friend, they work together to find Lee and Nicky and stop The Master and his followers known as The Omen Group from causing further destruction.

1.title: Captain Nick Hammond
1.plot: The Doctor finds himself is yet other human's life, Captain Nick Hammond. Meanwhile, an alien spacecraft has crashed in Central London. What is it? A shape shifter?

2.title: Fortress of the Cybershades
2.plot: The Doctor takes his new assistant back in time to a lovely peaceful seaside resort. Although, it is not lovely neither peaceful. It is very - metal.

3.title: The Doctor and the Disappearances
3.plot: As Nick becomes more familiar in the TARDIS surroundings and begins to enjoy his traveling adventure with The Doctor even more, things come crashing down when they arrive to visit a waterfall. Villagers are disappearing, and a witch is involved.

4.title: Weeping Wilderness
4.plot: Nick Hammond has an upset stomach, named the Pringles. The Doctor must leave Nick alone so that he does not catch the flu and so that Nick can recover. The Doctor meets a new friend, and a few old friends. To survive they must remember one thing... Do, Not, Blink.

0.title: The Unknown Descendant
0.plot: The Doctor returns to Earth with a splash and meets two new friends.

1.title: The Secrets of China
1.plot: After a year away traveling through the Universe, the Doctor returns to Earth to solve a mystery that has been bugging him for the past seven regenerations. In the Chinese village of Ying, the Doctor visited in 1956 with Romana, everyone died. Now he wants to know the truth in which leads him to near death.

2.title: The Rift Bomber
2.plot: The Doctor has now been traveling the Universe with an old friend, Banes Rattigan. When they return to Earth they discover that "it's happened again". Fort Paull is one of the UK's most historic WW2 museums and ever 10 years, someone goes missing withing it. In the past, Banes' brother, Dominic was one of the victims and he wants to find him. Meanwhile, General Royale (head of UNIT) has Lee and Nicky Boyce contained. All leading to the truth...

3.title: Ballad of the Doctor
3.plot: The Doctor and Banes dived into the Fort in which was the place where Banes' friend went missing on a school trip. They have discovered something. They have discovered that the Star has been behind the whole thing. Lee and Nicky are locked away underground. 1941 is about to collide with the year 2011. Can the Doctor stop it this time?

4.title: Dominic
4.plot: The Doctor and Lee arrive on a new alien planet. They find themselves in the middle of a war between the ZETAS and the ACS. But war is not the most important thing on their mind. They need to find a way back to Earth. And an old friend stops by to reveal the truth of whom he really is.

0.title: Series 3 Prequel
0.plot: Join Lee Boyce on a training mission in France whilst he tells you everything that he knows has happened to the current incarnation of the Doctor, from his companions to his enemies.

1.title: Before the Pandemic
1.plot: The Doctor returns to Earth after spending 5 years trapped on another world. He returns only to discover a deadly unknown virus has broken out and is already killing many people. He must trace the virus to its source in order to find a vaccine. But not everything goes to plan...

2.title: A Desperate Vaccination
2.plot: The Doctor and Lee take the situation into their own hands to try and track down who grew the vicious virus, leading to an explosive end. Nicky has gone to check on Dad but is shocked to what she has discovered.

3.title: Missing in Malham
3.plot: The Doctor and Lee go in search to Malham to find missing companion, Nick Hammond, a man the Doctor once traveled with before he met Lee and Nicky. But their every move is being watched. They are being followed. But by whom? And what for?

5.title: Into the Mariana Trench
5.plot: The Doctor, Lee, and Nicky venture down into the deepest place on Planet Earth, the Mariana Trench. They are investigating a disappearing submarine from 1966 which resurfaced in 2013 but soon after dived back into the waters. Are the crew still on board? Why did the submarine disappear in the first place? What are the waters keeping secret from the rest of the world? Captain Eric Harper takes the trio down aboard the HMS Tempus (Time) submarine vessel. The three get suspicious on who the Captain really is and so try to find out whilst on their mission. But neither the...

6.title: The Definitive Breath
6.plot: The Doctor, Lee, Nicky and Captain Eric Harper are trapped in the deepest place on Planet Earth, The Mariana Trench. After hitting a floating mine and taking on a lot of water aboard the HMS Tempus submarine vessel, they are stuck for ideas on how to reach the surface.

-1.title: The Fountain of Abydos
-1.plot: During a previous adventure, The Doctor had a final encounter with Dominic, a man who grew old by the rift itself on a school trip to Fort Paull with his brother, Banes. Dominic died when they fell from the edge of a cliff in Northern Carpathia but The Doctor discovered something in his possession, a crystal. But not just any ordinary crystal, a "Tempus Crystal" (Time Crystal) which can lock memories of past/future events and even people. For the memories to be unlocked and for The Doctor to remember Banes (previous companion), he must travel across the Universe to ...
